name: Roasted Pork Loin
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'dried rosemary'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'boneless pork loin roast'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white wine'}
steps: Gather all ingredients. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).. Crush garlic with rosemary, salt, and pepper in a mortar and pestle to make a paste.. Pierce meat with a sharp knife in several places and press garlic paste into the openings. Rub pork loin with the remaining garlic mixture and olive oil. Set into an oven-safe pan.. Place pork loin into the preheated oven, turning and basting with pan liquids every 30 minutes. Cook until the pork is no longer pink in the center, 90 minutes to 2 hours. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 145 degrees F (63 degrees C). Remove roast to a platter and keep warm.. Place pan onto the stove over medium-high heat and pour wine into it. Heat wine and stir to loosen browned bits from the bottom of the pan. Simmer for 3 to 5 minutes.. Slice pork loin and serve with pan juices.

ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'apples - peeled, cored and chopped'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cinnamon'}

name: Easy Roasted Broccoli
ingredients: {'quantity': '14', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'broccoli'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).. Cut broccoli florets from the stalk. Peel the stalk and slice into 1/4-inch slices. Mix florets and stem pieces with olive oil in a bowl and transfer to a baking sheet; season with salt and pepper.. Roast in the preheated oven until broccoli is tender and lightly browned, about 18 to 20 minutes.

name: Grilled Asparagus
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'fresh asparagus spears, trimmed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}

name: High Temperature Eye-of-Round Roast
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(3 pound)', 'name': 'beef eye of round roast'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}
steps: Gather the ingredients. Preheat the oven to 500 degrees F (260 degrees C).. Season roast with salt and pepper.. Place in a roasting pan or baking dish. Do not cover or add water.. Place roast in the preheated oven and reduce temperature to 475 degrees F (245 degrees C). Roast for 21 minutes (7 minutes per pound), then turn off the oven and let roast sit in the hot oven for 2 1/2 hours. Do not open the door at all during this time.. Remove roast from the oven and check that the internal temperature is at least 145 degrees F (65 degrees C). Carve into thin slices to serve.

name: Chef John's Perfect Mashed Potatoes
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'russet potatoes, peeled and cut in half lengthwise'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'whole milk'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Place potatoes in a large pot and cover with salted water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until tender, 20 to 25 minutes.. Drain potatoes, then return to the pot. Turn heat to high and allow potatoes to dry for about 30 seconds. Turn off heat.. Mash potatoes with a potato masher twice around the pot, then add milk and butter. Continue to mash until smooth and fluffy. Whisk in salt and black pepper until evenly distributed, about 15 seconds.

name: Brown Sugar and Pineapple Glazed Ham
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(6 pound)', 'name': 'fully-cooked, bone-in ham'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'fresh pineapple'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '(6 ounce) cans', 'name': 'pineapple juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'brown sugar'}

name: Southern Fried Chicken Livers
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'chicken livers'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'egg'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'all-purpose flour'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'name': 'vegetable oil for frying'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Place chicken livers in a colander; rinse with cold water and drain well. Blot dry with paper towels.. Whisk egg and milk together in a shallow dish until blended.. Place flour, garlic powder, salt, and pepper into a zip-top bag; shake to combine. Heat oil in a deep fryer or large saucepan to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).. Dip chicken livers in egg mixture to coat, then transfer, one at a time, into flour mixture, shaking the bag to coat completely.. Gently place coated livers, a few at a time, into hot oil; cover with a splatter screen and cook until crisp and golden brown, 5 to 6 minutes.. Serve with your choice of dip. Enjoy!

name: Asian Coconut Rice

name: Slow Cooker Baked Potatoes
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'baking potatoes, well scrubbed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'extra virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'kosher salt to taste'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'sheets', 'name': 'aluminum foil'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Prick potatoes with a fork several times, then rub with olive oil and season with salt.. Wrap tightly in foil and place into the slow cooker.. Cook until tender, on Low for 7 1/2 hours or on High for 4 1/2 to 5 hours.. Serve with your choice of toppings and enjoy!

name: Easy Authentic Mexican Rice
ingredients: {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'canola oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'onion powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'uncooked white rice'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(6.5 ounce) can', 'name': 'tomato sauce'}
steps: Heat canola oil in a skillet over medium-high heat; season with onion powder and garlic powder. Stir in rice and cook until golden, 2 to 4 minutes.. Stir in water and tomato sauce; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and simmer until rice is tender, about 15 minutes.

name: Dry Onion Soup Mix
ingredients: {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'dried onion flakes'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'low-sodium beef bouillon granules'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'onion powder'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'parsley flakes'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'celery seed'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'paprika'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Stir onion flakes, beef bouillon granules, onion powder, parsley flakes, celery seed, paprika, and black pepper together in a bowl. Use as a substitute for a 1-ounce envelope of dry onion soup mix.

name: Pinakbet
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'pork loin, chopped'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'peeled and deveined prawns'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'tomato, chopped'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'zucchini, seeded and cut into bite-size pieces'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'fresh okra, ends trimmed'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'fresh green beans, trimmed'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'eggplant, cut into bite-size pieces'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'bitter melon, cut into bite-size pieces'}
steps: Heat oil in a large pot over medium heat; stir in onion and garlic and cook until tender, about 5 minutes.. Add pork; cook and stir until browned, 5 to 7 minutes.. Add prawns; cook and stir until they turn pink, about 5 minutes.. Stir in tomato; season with salt and pepper, cover and simmer for 5 minutes.. Stir in zucchini, okra, green beans, eggplant, and bitter melon; cover and cook until the vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes.

name: Baked Sweet Potatoes
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'sweet potatoes'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pinches', 'name': 'dried oregano or to taste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pinches', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pinches', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}

name: Strawberry Spinach Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'distilled white vinegar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'sesame seeds'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'poppy seeds'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'minced onion'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'paprika'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'Worcestershire sauce'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'name': 'strawberries - cleaned, hulled and sliced'}, {'quantity': '10', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'fresh spinach - rinsed, dried and torn into bite-size pieces'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'almonds, blanched and slivered'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Make dressing: Whisk together sugar, oil, vinegar, sesame seeds, poppy seeds, onion, paprika, and Worcestershire in a medium bowl. Cover and chill for 1 hour.. Make salad: Combine strawberries, spinach, and almonds in a large bowl.. Pour dressing over salad; toss to coat.. Refrigerate for 10 to 15 minutes before serving.

name: Brazilian Grilled Pineapple
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'pineapple - peeled, cored, and cut into 6 wedges'}
steps: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.. Whisk brown sugar and cinnamon together in a bowl.. Transfer into a large resealable plastic bag. Add pineapple wedges to the bag; shake well to coat each wedge.. Grill pineapple wedges on the preheated grill until heated through, 3 to 5 minutes per side.

name: Lime Cilantro Rice
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'kosher salt'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'long-grain white rice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped cilantro'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fresh lime juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'lime zest'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Bring water and salt to a boil in a small saucepan. Stir in rice and butter. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer until rice is tender, about 20 minutes.. Just before serving, add cilantro, lime juice, and lime zest.. Enjoy!

name: Sautéed Apples
ingredients: {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'tart apples - peeled, cored and sliced ¼ inch thick'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'cold water'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'cornstarch'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cinnamon'}
steps: Melt butter in a large skillet or saucepan over medium heat.. Add apples and cook, stirring constantly, until almost tender, 6 to 7 minutes.. Mix water and cornstarch together in a small bowl until cornstarch is dissolved; pour over apples. Stir in brown sugar and cinnamon. Bring to a boil for 2 minutes, stirring occasionally.. Remove from heat and serve warm.

name: Oven-Baked Potato Fries
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'baking potatoes, each cut into six wedges'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried thyme leaves'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt to taste'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'shredded Cheddar cheese (Optional)'}
steps: Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).. Arrange potato wedges on a baking sheet; drizzle with olive oil and season with thyme, pepper, and salt. Toss wedges with a spatula to coat evenly.. Roast potato wedges in the preheated oven for 15 minutes; flip and continue roasting until soft in the center, about 15 minutes more.. Transfer wedges to a platter and sprinkle with cheese.

name: Sautéed Asparagus
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'fresh asparagus'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, chopped'}
steps: Gather the ingredients.. Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add asparagus spears and garlic; cover and cook until asparagus is tender-crisp, about 5 to 10 minutes depending on thickness of asparagus.. If you like your asparagus well done, reduce heat and cook for an additional few minutes.. Serve and enjoy!

name: Egg Bites
ingredients: {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'cooking spray'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'tri-color baby potatoes, thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'stick', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '10', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'eggs'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'yellow bell pepper, finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'tomato, finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'fresh spinach'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped ham'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped white onion'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'slice', 'name': 'mozzarella cheese, cut into 12 cubes'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Spray a 12-cup muffin tin with nonstick cooking spray.. Place a thin layer of potato slices in the bottom of each muffin cup. Add a little butter on top.. Bake in the preheated oven for 5 minutes.. Mix together eggs, bell pepper, tomato, spinach, ham, and onion in a large bowl. Ladle egg mixture over warm potatoes. Top each muffin cup with a mozzarella cube.. Continue baking until eggs are set, about 20 minutes.

name: Slow Cooker Creamed Corn
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ¼', 'unit': '(16 ounce) packages', 'name': 'frozen corn kernels'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce) package', 'name': 'cream cheese'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'milk'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Combine corn, cream cheese, butter, milk, and sugar in a slow cooker. Season with salt and pepper to taste.. Cook on Low for 4 to 6 hours or High for 2 to 4 hours.

name: World's Greatest Vegetable Broth
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'sweet onions, peeled and cut into wedges'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'tomatoes, cored and quartered'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'carrots, cut into 1-inch pieces'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'green bell pepper, cut into 1-inch pieces'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'turnips, cubed'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'celery, cut into 1-inch pieces'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'bunch', 'name': 'fresh parsley, chopped'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': '', 'name': 'whole black peppercorns'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'whole cloves'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'bay leaf'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'gallon', 'name': 'water'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).. Place onions, tomatoes, carrots, bell peppers, and turnips in a large roasting pan; drizzle with olive oil and toss to coat.. Roast in the preheated oven, stirring every 15 minutes, until vegetables are tender and onions are caramelized, about 1 hour.. Transfer roasted vegetables into a large stockpot. Add celery, parsley, garlic, peppercorns, cloves, and bay leaf. Pour in water and bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer, uncovered, until liquid is reduced by half, 20 to 40 minutes.. Strain broth into a large bowl, reserving vegetables for another use.

name: Tri Tip Roast
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(1 1/2 pound)', 'name': 'beef tri tip roast, trimmed'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried thyme'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried basil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried marjoram'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dry mustard'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'red wine'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil, or as needed'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Rub beef all over with thyme, basil, marjoram, dry mustard, salt, and black pepper; transfer into a resealable plastic bag. Seal the bag and refrigerate, 8 hours to overnight.. Pour red wine into the bag 4 hours before cooking.. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C). Drizzle olive oil over the bottom of a roasting pan; transfer beef into the prepared roasting pan.. Roast in the preheated oven for 15 minutes. Reduce oven temperature to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and continue roasting until slightly pink in the center, 20 to 25 minutes more. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 140 degrees F (60 degrees C). Let rest for 5 to 10 minutes before thinly slicing against the grain.

name: Suzy's Mashed Red Potatoes
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'small red potatoes, quartered'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'milk'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sour cream'}, {'quantity': None, 'unit': None, 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add red potatoes, and cook until tender but still firm, about 10 minutes; drain.. Transfer potatoes to a large bowl; add butter, milk, sour cream, salt, and pepper.. Mash mixture together until smooth and creamy.

name: Puerto Rican Tostones (Fried Plantains)
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'green plantain'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'oil for frying'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cold water'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt to taste'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Peel plantain and cut into 1-inch slices. Fill a bowl with 3 cups of cold water.. Heat oil in a large deep skillet over medium-high heat; add plantain slices in an even layer and fry on both sides until golden brown, about 3 1/2 minutes per side. Set skillet aside.. Transfer plantain slices to a chopping board; flatten each one by placing a small plate on top and pressing down.. Dip plantain slices in cold water.. Reheat oil in the skillet over medium heat; cook plantain slices for 1 minute on each side.. Season to taste with salt and serve immediately.

name: Pan Fried Brussels Sprouts
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'crushed garlic'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': '', 'name': 'white onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'trimmed Brussels sprouts'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'garlic powder, or to taste'}
steps: Gather the ingredients.. Heat olive oil in a cast-iron skillet over medium-low heat. Add garlic and stir until golden brown and fragrant, about 2 to 3 minutes. Add onion and cook until soft, stirring often, about 5 minutes.. Add Brussels sprouts and cook until one side of the sprouts turns golden brown, 5 to 7 minutes. Stir to turn sprouts over and cook until evenly golden brown, another 5 to 7 minutes. Season with salt, black pepper, and garlic powder.

name: Air Fryer Hasselback Potatoes
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'Yukon Gold potatoes'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'melted butter'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, crushed'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground paprika'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}
steps: Preheat an air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and gather all ingredients.. Cut 1/4-inch slices into each potato, making sure the knife only cuts through to the bottom 1/2-inch, keeping the bottom of potato intact. Combine butter, olive oil, garlic, and paprika in a small bowl.. Brush some of the mixture over each potato and into the slits. Season with salt and pepper.. Place potatoes in the basket and cook in the preheated air fryer for 15 minutes.. Brush potatoes with butter mixture, making sure it drips down the fanned-out slices to ensure potatoes will not be dry. Cook until potatoes are cooked through, about 15 minutes more.. Remove potatoes from the basket and brush with any remaining butter mixture. Sprinkle with chopped parsley.

name: Campfire Baked Potatoes
ingredients: {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'baking potatoes'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter, softened'}, {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'sheets', 'name': 'heavy-duty aluminum foil'}
steps: Poke each potato several times all over with a fork. Smear each potato with 1 tablespoon of butter, then double wrap in aluminum foil.. Bury potatoes in the hot coals of a campfire and cook until crispy on the outside and tender inside, about 30 to 60 minutes.

name: Baked Salmon in Foil
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'cloves garlic, minced or pressed through a garlic press'}, {'quantity': '2 ½', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried oregano'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried thyme'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'aluminum foil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(3 pound)', 'name': 'salmon fillet'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped fresh parsley'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, sliced'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).. Combine 1/2 cup olive oil, garlic, lemon juice, brown sugar, oregano, thyme, salt, and pepper in a bowl.. Place a large piece of aluminum foil on a baking sheet and brush with 1 teaspoon olive oil. Place salmon, skin-side down, in the middle of the foil. Drizzle with olive oil mixture.. Fold up the edges of the foil over salmon to create a packet, making sure to seal the edges.. Bake in the preheated oven until fish flakes easily with a fork, 20 to 25 minutes. Garnish with fresh parsley and lemon slices.

name: Roast Leg of Lamb
ingredients: {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'leg of lamb'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, sliced'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fresh rosemary'}

name: Slow Cooker Green Beans, Ham and Potatoes
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'fresh green beans, rinsed and trimmed'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ham hocks'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'new potatoes, quartered'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chicken bouillon granules'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'onion powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'seasoning salt'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Gather the ingredients.. Halve green beans if they are large; place in a slow cooker with water to barely cover. Add ham hocks and onion. Cover and cook on High until simmering. Reduce heat to Low; cook until beans are crisp but not done, 2 to 3 hours.. Remove ham hocks from the slow cooker. Add potatoes to the slow cooker; cook on Low for 45 minutes.. Meanwhile, remove ham meat from the bones, then chop or shred meat and return to the slow cooker. Season with bouillon, garlic powder, onion powder, seasoning salt, and pepper.. Use a slotted spoon to transfer green beans, potatoes, and ham into a serving dish with a bit of broth.

name: Baked French Fries
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'baking potato'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'paprika'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'chili powder'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'onion powder'}
steps: Gather the ingredients. Preheat the oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees C).. Cut potato into thick wedges.. Mix olive oil, paprika, garlic powder, chili powder, and onion powder together in a medium bowl. Add potato wedges and toss to coat evenly; arrange on a baking sheet.. Bake in the preheated oven, turning once or twice, until golden brown and crispy, about 45 minutes.. Serve and enjoy!

name: Easy Broccoli Bacon Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '12', 'unit': 'slices', 'name': 'cooked bacon, crumbled'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large head', 'name': 'broccoli, cut into florets'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'raisins'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'small', 'name': 'red onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'sunflower seeds'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'mayonnaise'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'red wine vinegar'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Combine bacon, broccoli, raisins, onion, and sunflower seeds in a large bowl.. Whisk mayonnaise, sugar, and red wine vinegar together in a small bowl until dressing is smooth.. Pour over broccoli mixture and stir to coat.

name: Boiled Chicken
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(3 pound)', 'name': 'whole chicken'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'onion, halved - unpeeled'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'carrots, cut into chunks - unpeeled'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'stalks', 'name': 'celery, cut into chunks'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'whole peppercorns'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Place chicken in a large pot with onion, carrots, celery, and peppercorns; add water to cover by 1 inch.. Cover the pot and bring to a boil; reduce heat to a gentle boil and cook until meat falls off the bone, about 90 minutes.. Remove chicken from the pot and let sit until cool enough to handle. Shred or chop meat.

name: Air Fryer Fingerling Potatoes
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'fingerling potatoes, halved lengthwise'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground paprika'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'parsley flakes'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Preheat an air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).. Place potato halves in a large bowl. Add olive oil, paprika, parsley, garlic powder, salt, and pepper; stir until evenly coated. Place potatoes in the air fryer basket.. Cook in the preheated air fryer for 10 minutes; stir and cook until desired crispness is reached, about 5 more minutes.

name: Easy Mushroom Barley Soup
ingredients: {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped onion'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'diced carrots'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped celery'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'sliced fresh mushrooms'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'chicken broth'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'barley'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}
steps: Heat oil in a large soup pot over medium heat. Add onion, carrots, celery and garlic; cook and stir until onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes. Stir in mushrooms and continue to cook for about 3 minutes.. Pour in chicken broth, add barley, and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer until barley is tender, about 40 to 50 minutes.. Season with salt and pepper before serving.

name: Maple Glazed Carrots
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'baby carrots'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '⅓', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'maple syrup'}, {'quantity': None, 'unit': None, 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Place carrots into a pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Drain and transfer carrots to a serving bowl.. Melt butter in a saucepan over medium-low heat. Stir maple syrup into melted butter and cook until warmed, 1 to 2 minutes. Pour over carrots and toss to coat; season with salt and pepper.

name: Roasted Acorn Squash Soup
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'acorn squash, halved and seeded'}, {'quantity': None, 'unit': None, 'name': 'water, as needed'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'unsalted butter'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'sweet onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'carrot, peeled and chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, minced'}, {'quantity': '3 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'low-sodium chicken stock'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'half-and-half'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground nutmeg'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground cinnamon'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).. Arrange squash cut-side down in a baking dish. Pour enough water into the baking dish to cover the bottom.. Bake squash in the preheated oven until easily pierced with a knife, about 45 minutes. Remove from the oven and cool until easily handled. Scoop flesh into a bowl and set aside.. Melt butter in a pot over medium-high heat. Add onion, carrot, and garlic; cook and stir until onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 to 7 minutes. Pour chicken stock into the pot; stir in squash and simmer for 20 minutes.. Fill blender halfway with soup mixture. Cover and hold lid down; pulse a few times before leaving on to blend. Puree in batches until smooth and return to pot.. Stir in half-and-half, nutmeg, and cinnamon; season with salt and pepper. Thin the soup with water if desired.

name: Pan Fried Green Beans
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'fresh green beans, trimmed and snapped'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'onion powder, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}
steps: Gather ingredients.. Combine green beans, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper in a stainless steel pot over medium-high heat. Cook, covered, until beans begin to sweat. Remove the lid and stir occasionally until beans are tender.. When beans and spices begin to char on the bottom of the pan, stir in olive oil and turn off heat. Cover and let stand a few minutes.. Scrape the bottom of the pan to incorporate charred spices. Beans should have a dark, caramel color, but not black.

name: Spinach and Strawberry Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'bunches', 'name': 'spinach, rinsed and torn into bite-size pieces'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'sliced strawberries'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white wine vinegar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'sesame seeds'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'poppy seeds'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'paprika'}
steps: Toss spinach and strawberries together in a large bowl.. Whisk oil, sugar, vinegar, sesame seeds, poppy seeds, and paprika together in a medium bowl; pour over spinach and strawberries, and toss to coat.

name: Maple and Brown Sugar Oatmeal
ingredients: {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'quick-cooking oats'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'packed dark brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'maple syrup'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Bring water to a boil in a small pot. Add oats and cook, stirring, for 1 minute.. Remove from heat and stir in brown sugar and maple syrup. Let sit until desired thickness is reached, 2 to 3 minutes.

name: Parchment Baked Salmon
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(8 ounce)', 'name': 'salmon fillet'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped basil leaves'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'olive oil cooking spray'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, thinly sliced'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Move an oven rack to the lowest position.. Place salmon fillet, skin-side down, in the middle of a large piece of parchment paper; season with salt and black pepper. Cut two 3-inch slits into fillet with a sharp knife. Stuff chopped basil leaves into the slits. Spray fillet with cooking spray and arrange lemon slices on top.. Fold the edges of parchment paper over fillet several times to seal it into an airtight packet. Place sealed packet onto a baking sheet.. Bake in the preheated oven on the bottom rack until salmon flakes easily and flesh is pink and opaque with an interior of slightly darker pink color, about 25 minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the thickest part of fillet should read at least 145 degrees F (65 degrees C). To serve, cut open the parchment paper and remove lemon slices before plating.

name: Sautéed Sweet Plantains (Tajaditas Dulces de Platano)
ingredients: {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'peanut oil for frying'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'yellow plantains (very ripe), peeled and cut in 1-inch-thick slices'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'salt (Optional)'}
steps: Round up all your ingredients, and heat peanut oil and butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat until butter begins to sizzle.. Gently toss plantain slices with brown sugar, then place into hot oil. Fry until plantains begin to turn golden brown, then turn over, and continue frying until caramelized, about 2 minutes per side.. Drain plantains on a paper towel-lined plate and sprinkle with salt before serving.

name: Muesli
ingredients: {'quantity': '4 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'rolled oats'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'raisins'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'toasted wheat germ'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'wheat bran'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'oat bran'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped walnuts'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'packed brown sugar'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'raw sunflower seeds'}
steps: Combine oats, raisins, wheat germ, wheat bran, oat bran, walnuts, brown sugar, and sunflower seeds in a large bowl; mix well. Store muesli in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 2 months.

name: Greek Chicken
ingredients: {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemons, juiced'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh rosemary'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh thyme'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'chopped fresh oregano'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '(4 pound)', 'name': 'chicken, cut into pieces'}
steps: Mix olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, rosemary, thyme, and oregano in a glass dish. Place chicken pieces in the mixture; cover and marinate in the refrigerator for 2 to 3 hours.. Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat and lightly oil the grate.. Place chicken on the grill, and discard the marinade. Cook until chicken is no longer pink at the bone and the juices run clear, about 15 minutes per side (smaller pieces will not take as long). An instant-read thermometer inserted near the bone should read 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).

name: Creamy Make-Ahead Mashed Potatoes
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'russet potatoes, scrubbed but unpeeled'}, {'quantity': '1 ½', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'half-and-half'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt to taste'}, {'quantity': '6', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'butter, softened'}
steps: Place potatoes in a large pot and cover with salted water; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, about 20 minutes. Drain.. Heat half-and-half in the microwave until just warm.. Process unpeeled potatoes through a food mill into a medium bowl. (Or, using a potholder, peel and drop them into a bowl. Puree using a potato masher or stand mixer fitted with the paddle attachment.) Stir in warm half-and-half and salt (or beat, if using a mixer) until smooth and fluffy. Cool, cover, and refrigerate potatoes in a microwave-safe, airtight container for up to 2 days.. Thirty minutes before serving, microwave until warm. Transfer to a heatproof bowl set over a pan of simmering water. Stir in butter to melt. Cover and keep warm.

name: Jamie's Cranberry Spinach Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '¾', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'almonds, blanched and slivered'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pound', 'name': 'spinach, rinsed and torn into bite-size pieces'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'dried cranberries'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'vegetable oil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white sugar'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'cider vinegar'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'white wine vinegar'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'toasted sesame seeds'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'poppy seeds'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'minced onion'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'paprika'}
steps: Melt butter in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Cook and stir almonds in butter until lightly toasted. Remove from heat and let cool.. Make dressing: Whisk together oil, sugar, cider vinegar, white wine vinegar, sesame seeds, poppy seeds, minced onion, and paprika in a medium bowl.. Combine spinach with toasted almonds and cranberries in a large serving bowl. Pour dressing over spinach mixture; toss well.

name: Avocado Salad
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': None, 'name': 'ripe avocados - peeled, pitted and diced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'sweet onion, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'green bell pepper, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'ripe tomato, chopped'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'chopped fresh cilantro'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lime, juiced'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}

name: Lyonnaise Potatoes
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'pounds', 'name': 'russet potatoes'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'onions, thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'chopped garlic'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt to taste'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'ground white pepper, to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'finely minced fresh parsley'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).. Peel potatoes and cut them into 1/2-inch slices. Place in a pot and cover with water; bring to a boil. Boil for 2 minutes, then drain and set aside.. Heat a large oven-proof skillet over medium-high heat. Pour in olive oil, then add onions. Sauté until lightly caramelized, 8 to 10 minutes. Stir in garlic and sauté until onions are deep brown and garlic is soft. Transfer mixture to a bowl.. Place the skillet back on the stove over low heat. Melt butter in the skillet, then cover the bottom with 1/3 of the potatoes. Season with salt and pepper. Cover potatoes with 1/2 of the onion mixture. Cover with 1/2 of the remaining potatoes; season with salt and pepper. Spread remaining onion mixture on top. Cover with remaining potatoes; season with salt and pepper.. Bake in the preheated oven until potatoes are tender and browned on top, 10 to 12 minutes.. Use a spatula to transfer potatoes to a serving platter. Sprinkle with chopped parsley just before serving.

name: Classic Vichyssoise
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'butter'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': '', 'name': 'leeks, bulb only, sliced into rings'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'onion, sliced'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'potatoes, peeled and thinly sliced'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried marjoram'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried thyme'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'bay leaf'}, {'quantity': '5', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'chicken broth'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'heavy whipping cream'}
steps: Gather all ingredients.. Melt butter in a large stockpot over low heat. Add leeks and onion; cover and cook for 10 minutes.. Stir in potatoes; season with salt and pepper. Add marjoram, thyme, and bay leaf; stir well. Cover and cook for 12 minutes.. Pour in chicken broth. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and cook, partially covered, for 30 minutes.. Purée soup in a blender or food processor. Allow to cool to room temperature, then stir in cream.

name: Balsamic Grilled Zucchini
ingredients: {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'zucchinis, quartered lengthwise'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'teaspoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'Italian seasoning'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'salt'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'balsamic vinegar'}

name: Lemon Garlic Tilapia
ingredients: {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'nonstick cooking spray'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '', 'name': 'tilapia fillets'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'butter, melted'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'clove', 'name': 'garlic, finely chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried parsley flakes'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'dash', 'name': 'pepper to taste'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). Spray a baking dish with nonstick cooking spray.. Rinse tilapia fillets under cool water, and pat dry with paper towels.. Place fillets in the prepared baking dish. Pour lemon juice over fillets, then drizzle butter on top. Sprinkle with garlic, parsley, and pepper.. Bake in the preheated oven until fish is white and flakes when pulled apart with a fork, about 30 minutes.

name: Lemon-Orange Orange Roughy
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '4', 'unit': '(4 ounce) fillets', 'name': 'orange roughy'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'orange, juiced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'lemon, juiced'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'lemon pepper'}
steps: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.. Place fillets into hot oil. Drizzle with orange juice and lemon juice, then sprinkle fillets with lemon pepper. Cook until fish flakes easily with a fork, 2 to 3 minutes per side. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 145 degrees F (63 degrees C).

name: Roasted Eggplant
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'large eggplant'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'extra virgin olive oil'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'fresh lemon juice'}
steps: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or lightly grease.. Slice eggplant in half lengthwise, then cut each half into quarters lengthwise. Cut each piece in half to make two shorter quarters. Place eggplant skin-side down onto the prepared baking sheet. Brush with olive oil; season with salt and pepper.. Roast in the preheated oven until softened and golden brown, 25 to 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and sprinkle with lemon juice. Serve hot.

name: Slow Cooker Lengua (Beef Tongue)
ingredients: {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'beef tongue'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': '', 'name': 'onion'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'cloves', 'name': 'garlic, or more to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': '', 'name': 'bay leaf'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'butter'}
steps: Place beef tongue, onion, garlic, and bay leaf in a slow cooker; generously season with salt. Pour in enough water to cover beef mixture.. Cook on Low for 8 hours.. Transfer beef tongue to a work surface and cool slightly. Peel outer layer of skin from beef tongue and remove rough end.. Chop meat into bite-sized pieces.. Heat butter in a skillet over medium heat; cook and stir chopped meat until tender, 5 to 10 minutes. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Air Fryer Roasted Broccoli and Cauliflower
ingredients: {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'broccoli florets'}, {'quantity': '3', 'unit': 'cups', 'name': 'cauliflower florets'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': 'tablespoons', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '½', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'garlic powder'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'sea salt'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'paprika'}, {'quantity': '⅛', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'ground black pepper'}
steps: Preheat an air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).. Place broccoli florets in a large, microwave-safe bowl. Cook in the microwave at full power for 3 minutes; drain any accumulated liquid.. Add cauliflower, olive oil, garlic powder, sea salt, paprika, and black pepper to the bowl with broccoli; mix well to combine. Pour mixture into the air fryer basket.. Cook in the preheated air fryer for 12 minutes, tossing vegetables halfway through cooking time for even browning.

name: Greek Lentil Soup (Fakes)
ingredients: {'quantity': '8', 'unit': 'ounces', 'name': 'brown lentils'}, {'quantity': '¼', 'unit': 'cup', 'name': 'olive oil'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'medium', 'name': 'onion, minced'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'large', 'name': 'carrot, chopped'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'minced garlic'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'quart', 'name': 'water'}, {'quantity': '2', 'unit': '', 'name': 'bay leaves'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'dried oregano'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'pinch', 'name': 'crushed dried rosemary (Optional)'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'tablespoon', 'name': 'tomato paste'}, {'quantity': '', 'unit': '', 'name': 'salt and ground black pepper to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'olive oil, or to taste'}, {'quantity': '1', 'unit': 'teaspoon', 'name': 'red wine vinegar, or to taste (Optional)'}
steps: Place lentils in a large saucepan; add enough water to cover by 1 inch. Bring water to a boil and cook for 10 minutes; drain.. Heat olive oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Add onion, carrot, and garlic; cook and stir until onion has softened and turned translucent, about 5 minutes. Pour in lentils, then add 1 quart water, bay leaves, oregano, and rosemary. Bring to a boil. Cover and reduce heat to medium-low; simmer for 10 minutes.. Stir in tomato paste; season with salt and pepper. Cover and simmer, stirring occasionally, until lentils have softened, 30 to 40 minutes. Add additional water if soup becomes too thick. Drizzle with olive oil and red wine vinegar to serve.
